The [http://www.onlineshop.dmx4all.de/product_info.php?language=en&products_id=545|NanoDMX USB Interface] is a low cost DMX USB Interface using a virtual COM-Port and a good documented protocol.
Surprisingly the Interface still works with the module i made back in 2004 for the DMX4ALL RS232-board ((msberger.Modules.Devices.DMX4allRS232|link)).
As there now also is a more straight forward protocol "Fast Mode" here a new module using this protocol.
The module should work with all currently available DMX-interfaces by [http://www.dmx4all.de|DMX4ALL] (not tested though).
